EmailTemplate.name: 17.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.L.G.N.17206.AirScale 2017.Email 1 - Beyond Gigabit
EmailTemplate.subject: Deploy TD-LTE today, be ready for the 5G future
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Deploy TD-LTE today, be ready for 5G Match fixed broadband performance, with full mobility TD-LTE has moved into the global mainstream as a cost-effective, flexible and easy way to deliver gigabit and higher throughputs. The result is a great customer experience using high spectral efficiency on TD-LTE devices that are widely available globally. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
